title: Stock market news live updates: Stocks tumble following red-hot inflation print, Fed policymaker's remarks - Yahoo Finance
content: Stock market news live updates: Stocks tumble following red-hot inflation print, Fed policymaker's remarks  Yahoo Finance
description: U.S. stocks declined on Thursday as Wall Street weighed another decades-high inflation print for clues on how aggressively the Federal Reserve will adjust monetary conditions to rein in surging prices levels.
